############################
# Visual Studio
############################

# User-specific files
*.suo
*.user
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# Visual Studio working folder
.vs/

# Build results
[Bb]in/
[Oo]bj/
[Ll]og/
[Bb]uild/

# Visual Studio cache / generated files
*.dbmdl
*.cache
*.pdb
*.mdb

# Visual Studio profiler
*.psess
*.vsp
*.vspx

# NuGet
*.nupkg
**/packages/*
!**/packages/build/
!**/packages/repositories.config

# Azure build artifacts
csx/
*.build.csdef

# Publish output
*.publishsettings
*.pubxml
*.pubxml.user

# Resharper
_ReSharper*/
*.[Rr]e[Ss]harper
*.DotSettings.user

# Rider
.idea/
*.sln.iml

# VS Code
.vscode/

# Backup files
*.bak
*.orig

# Web stuff
node_modules/
npm-debug.log
yarn-error.log

############################
# .NET
############################

# Compiled files
*.dll
*.exe
*.app
*.appsettings
*.cache
*.config

# Entity Framework
migrations/

# ASP.NET
App_Data/
App_Data/*

# Logs
*.log

# Environment variables
.env
.env.*

############################
# OS Generated
############################

# Windows
Thumbs.db
Desktop.ini

# Mac
.DS_Store
